motac

Schema

class motac.schema.Event(t, lat, lon, mark=None, meta=None)[source]

Bases: object

Canonical event record.

Milestone M1 keeps the schema minimal but stable.

t

Event time in seconds (float). Use a consistent epoch per dataset.

lat, lon

WGS84 latitude/longitude in decimal degrees.

mark

Optional discrete mark (e.g. event type).

meta

Optional metadata.

t: float
lat: float
lon: float
mark: str | None
meta: Mapping[str, Any] | None
__init__(t, lat, lon, mark=None, meta=None)
